abstract: Protesters calling for ouster of Guatemalan Pres Otto Perez Molina intensify their efforts, as offices of attorney general and comptroller, along with national Council of Bishops and top business organization, join in urging resignation of president.
lead_paragraph: Pressure grew Thursday on President Otto Pérez Molina to resign as thousands of protesters marched in the capital.

headline.main: Guatemala: President Is Urged to Resign
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Guatemala: More Calls for a Resignation

snippet: Pressure grew Thursday on President Otto Pérez Molina to resign as thousands of protesters marched in the capital.
